articles.description: The Norwegian hot-shot was on Bayern's radar earlier this year during his time at Borussia Dortmund where he scored an incredible 86 goals in just 89 games.
articles.content:
Erling Haaland has admitted he felt sorry for Robert Lewandowski after Bayern Munich's failed attempts to land star striker Haaland as a replacement for the Pole.
The Norwegian hot-shot was on Bayer… [+2881 chars]

articles.author: Oliver Holt
articles.title: OLIVER HOLT: How has Emma Raducanu been allowed to sink this low? - Daily Mail
articles.description: OLIVER HOLT - CHIEF SPORTS WRITER: If Emma Raducanu never wins another tennis match in her life, she will have achieved more than the vast majority of elite players will ever achieve.
articles.content: If Emma Raducanu never wins another tennis match in her life, she will have achieved more than the vast majority of elite players will ever achieve. She won a Grand Slam. She is a US Open winner. She… [+5761 chars]
